meanings.definition: The state or quality of being favorable.
meanings.sent1: The favorablenesses of the weather made the picnic enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She always looks for the favorablenesses in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The favorablenesses of the situation were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a reflection of the favorablenesses in his life.
meanings.sent5: The favorablenesses of her personality shone through in her kind actions.

meanings.definition: The condition of being advantageous or beneficial.
meanings.sent1: The favorablenesses of the deal were too good to pass up.
meanings.sent2: He carefully considered all the favorablenesses before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The favorablenesses of the new job offer were music to her ears.
meanings.sent4: The favorablenesses of the plan were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the favorablenesses of the opportunity with open arms.
